creator: davidsk

content:
Kedves Ferenc!

Nagyon úgy tűnik, hogy ez a felület hibája (pontosabban hiányossága), ez az oldalsáv figyelmen kívül hagyja a betűméret és a sűrűség globális beállítását; és a felületről nem lehet átméretezni. Ezt hamarosan be fogom jelenti a Bugzillába.

Addig is kerülőmegoldás nyújthatnak az alábbiak:

  • Az operációs rendszer akadálymentesítési programjai, például a Nagyítása
  • A képernyő méretezésének beállítása az operációs rendszerben (a Microsoft leírása)
  • Az oldalsáv használata helyett levélírás közvetlenül a címjegyzék képernyőről (jobb kattintás az érintett névjegyeken, és Írás)

Üdv, Balázs
creator: meskobalazs

creator: paolocarpani

content:
Try this: - if menu bar is not shown, press alt key - now, with the folder highlighted, press view>layout and tick 'unthreaded' - repeat that for each folder, e.g., input and sent folders.

To make unthreaded the default for any NEW folders you create, - click settings>general an scroll down to 'config editor' at bottom and click it. - enter mailnews.default_view_flags and change value to 0 and save.
creator: davidsk

content:
1. È successo improvvisamente? Dopo un aggiornamento?
  2. L'account è configurato come IMAP o come POP3? E sull'altro computer è IMAP o POP3?
  3. Hai mai fatto dei backup?
  4. Se non hai backup recenti, inizia col farne uno -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/profili-thunderbird#w_effettuare-una-copia-di-sicurezza-del-profilo

creator: davidsk

content:
Thanks David. That solves that problem. One other issue popped up that you might be able to shed some light on, and that is that for some reason on the left-side folder list, my e-mail account is showing up below the Local Folders which is not convenient at all. I tried to drag the top-level local folder down to the bottom or the e-mail account folder up to the top, but that didn't work. Can you suggest a way to get the order 'normal'?

ps, I see from your picture that Mozilla is using genetically enhanced canines for support duties. It's nice to know Mozilla is an equal opportunity employer. Best wishes and congratulations on being "smarter than the aavveeraage dog" to misquote your genetically enhanced fellow critter.
creator: James-A

content: click to account settings pane and highlight your account in left side and drag up to where you want it. That will change the view on main window. Yes, we canines get all the dog biscuits we can eat. :)
creator: davidsk

content: Thank you for the kind words. Yes, we try to offer a friendly service. On Thunderbird, there are no limits. Yes, one mailbox is one email account, and you can have as many email accounts as you wish. If you are experiencing limits, you might check with your email provider on any quotas.
creator: davidsk

content: You didn't give much information. Some accounts, such as Outlook, automatically save in Sent folder, so setting to do that creates duplicates. Please give more information
